thread.title: Here’s Where to Buy the adidas YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra”
thread.title_full: Here’s Where to Buy the adidas YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra”

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Here’s Where to Buy the adidas YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra”
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
Ahead of this weekend’s release, adidas has provided an official store list for retailers that will be stocking the anticipated YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra” from Kanye West. As suggested by the number of participating stockists, this particular drop is expected to be highly limited.
The pair transitions from the previous tonal concept , going with an all-over white and black zebra look. “SPLY-350″ branding then appears in reverse alongside, while a heel pull has once again been implemented.
Reservations for the adidas YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra” begin via adidas’s Confirmed app on February 22, as you can look for the kicks to arrive at the retailers listed below on Saturday, February 25.
Good luck!
